name: Appro-Light
author:
Author:Originem. 
Main Art: Laomi, BZOne, Shadow Light, Ura. 
Art Assistance: Shadow Light, Ura.
Sound and Music: Shadow Light, MesoTronik
Special Thanks:MesoTronik, Nia, APuJun, Tartifilette, lili, FAX 
OpenGL support:Dark.Revenant 
Unofficial Translation by MrMagolor
description:
*Requires LazyLib
*Requires GraphicLib
*Requires MagicLib 0.26 or higher 

 This is a group of pilgrims who have risen in the dim constellation of the Perseus. Learn all knowledge, cast away your shackles, firmly cast forth dauntlessly in the name of the light! 
 This mod contains the Appro-Light Council and the forces of Immortal-Light
